Sen: Elizabeth Warren released the results of a genetic test showing she has a small but detectable amount of Native American DNA, providing evidence to support her claim of having Native American ancestry.
The genetic test results were not peer: reviewed, but four anthropological geneticists deemed the methodologies used to be valid and the conclusions reasonable, adding credibility to the authenticity of the claim.
President Donald Trump wrongly claimed t: doesn't have any Indian blood," misinterpreting the genetic test results and dismissing their validity.
Warren: s claim of Native American heritage has been a subject of controversy for years, with critics questioning whether she received any advantages from claiming such ancestry. However, there is no evidence to support the notion that she benefited from her claim.
